> [{quoted}](name=Teslablade,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=c0wJYFM1,comment-id=00010000000100010000,timestamp=2015-12-18T21:10:37.602+0000)
>
> Other way around.

I can't seem to imagine Darius as the immature younger brother and Draven as the mature dunker.
dont u mean...Sanidates?
Who the hell is rengar?

In order:  Rammus is Sans, Fiddlesticks is Papyrus, Kalista is Undyne, Heimerdinger is Alphys, Blitzcrank is Mettaton, and Rengar is Asgore.

And now I want to see Undertale skins...though I would recommend that Darius gets a Sans skin.  (If I have to explain this, I will be VERY disappointed in you...)

You see, that's a good reason why i don't like the undertale fanbase and a bunch of other fanbases. They think that knowing about this game is a privilege and anyone else who doesn't know every little bit of trivia is not a "true" player. Of course i know sans' "special" move, and a couple of other things.
gaster?
I'd feel like, personally, j4 makes a way better asgore just because they're both lance users. maybe "monster j4"?

I personally first thought of Undyne as Kalista ; cause they basically have the same spear spamming style. I think they could call it "deep terror kalista" and give her the red ponytail and fishy things on the face, it would work really easy.

And the second obvious one is "showman blitzcrank", with the mic and display body.
{{champion:143}} "Just a harmless flower."
Downvoted because undertrash. Get a good taste in games.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Now now, no need to be an ass. You can downvote all you like, but don't tell us that that's the correct decision.

There's no need for that.  I'm not a fan of Undertale either (haven't played it yet, so I really have no opinion on it), but let the fans have their harmless fun.  

And out of curiosity, what is *your* opinion of a good game?  Apart from League, that is.  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

The thing about undertale that makes me love it is this.
Replayability, and every action you take, will always have consequences, even if you restart the world. 
I honestly can't give everything away but the game is in its own category. 
It's styled somewhat like earthbound and controls like an old RPG, reminding you of your old times. yet being so innovative
one of the key features is that you do not have to kill ANYONE, not even the boss. Or you can kill everyone and become god-like, one shotting the boss before you even properly start the fight. One thing is that there is at least 7 endings i know of and have completed. I could probably rant forever, but IMO, this is the most i can do on an online board where i don't know if anyone who doesn't want spoilers will see this

Yeah, I've heard really good things about it, and art for it is all over tumblr.  I definitely want to play it at some point, but with the holidays coming up, I can't afford (money- and time-wise) to get hooked on another game right now.  It's high on my list of 'Play THIS next.'

Wait...Travis_Touchdown, is that you?  Who the drek let you out of your cage at Cheezburger?

(FYI:  He's someone who regularly posts negative comments about any game that isn't from Nintendo.  Undertale has been his latest target.)
{{champion:1}} - you got the main character right here :D
